name: درخواست ايجاد / اصلاح اطلاعات تامين كنندگان

items.name: درخواست ايجاد / اصلاح اطلاعات تامين كنندگان

items.label: درخواست ايجاد / حذف اطلاعات طرفهاي ذينفع

items.name: Search_Interested_Party
items.label: جستجو در عنوان كامل طرفهاي ذينفع
items.placeholder: با جستجوي اين مورد ، انتخاب كد مربوط به طرفهاي ذينفع فيلتر مي‌شود ... در صورت عدم جستجو، كليه موارد در دسترس مي‌باشد ...

items.name: Supplier_Replacement_Code
items.label: انتخاب كد طرف ذينفع
items.sql:
SELECT NULL Supplier_Code, "طرفهاي ذينفع و شخصيت آنها را انتخاب كنيد" Supplier_Code

UNION

SELECT Supplier_Code, CONCAT (Supplier_Code,' || ', Supplier_Full_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE IsDelete = 0
 and Supplier_Full_Title like '%@#Search_Interested_Party%'

columns.name: Subject_Code_Finder
columns.label: كد موضوع
columns.sql:
select Subject_Code ,Subject_Code
from PMT_TB120011
where isdelete = 0
 and Supplier_Code = '@#Supplier_Code_Finder'
 and Subject_Code_Rank = '@#Subject_Code_Rank'
columns.title: كد موضوع

columns.name: Subject_ID_L0_Finder
columns.label: دسته بندي موضوعي
columns.sql:
select Subject_Title
from PMT_TB110006
where isdelete = 0
 and Subject_Code = concat(left('@#Subject_Code_Finder',1) ,"0000-00")
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'
columns.title: دسته بندي موضوعي

columns.name: Subject_Title_Finder
columns.label: عنوان موضوع
columns.sql:
select Subject_Title
from PMT_TB110006
where isdelete = 0
 and Subject_Code = '@#Subject_Code_Finder'
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'
columns.title: عنوان موضوع

columns.name: CT_ID_Detector
columns.label: پيدا كننده رديف كد ذينفع
columns.sql:
select ID ,Subject_Code
from PMT_TB120011
where isdelete = 0
 and Supplier_Code = '@#Supplier_Code_Finder'
 and Subject_Code_Rank = '@#Subject_Code_Rank'
columns.title: پيدا كننده رديف كد ذينفع

items.name: Supplier_Abbr_Title
items.label: 1) عنوان اختصاري
items.sql:
SELECT Supplier_Abbr_Title
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Replacement_Code"
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

items.name: Supplier_Full_Title
items.label: 2) عنوان كامل
items.sql:
SELECT Supplier_Full_Title
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Replacement_Code"
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

items.name: Established_Date
items.label: 3) سال تاسيس
items.sql:
SELECT Established_Date
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Replacement_Code"
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

items.name: Supplier_Registration_Date
items.label: 4) تاريخ تشكيل پرونده
items.sql:
SELECT Supplier_Registration_Date
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Replacement_Code"
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

items.name: Supplier_Economic_Code
items.label: 5) كد اقتصادي
items.sql:
SELECT Supplier_Economic_Code
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Replacement_Code"
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

items.name: Supplier_Ownership_Find
items.label: 6) نوع مالكيت
items.sql:
SELECT if(Supplier_Ownership = 'GOV','دولتي','خصوصي')
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Code"
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

items.name: Supplier_Phone_No
items.label: 7) تلفن
items.sql:
SELECT Supplier_Phone_No
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Replacement_Code"
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

items.name: Supplier_Fax_No

items.sql:
SELECT Supplier_Fax_No

WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Replacement_Code"
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

items.name: Supplier_Zipcode
items.label: 9) كدپستي
items.sql:

FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Replacement_Code"
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

items.name: Supplier_Address

items.name: CEO_Full_Name
items.label: 12) نام و نام خانوادگي مدير عامل
items.sql:

FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Replacement_Code"

items.name: CEO_National_Code

items.name: Subject_Counter
items.label: شمارنده موضوعات
items.sql:
select count(ID)
from PMT_TB120011
where isdelete = 0
 and Supplier_Code = '@#Supplier_Replacement_Code'
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

items.name: MT_ID_Detector
items.label: رديف كد طرف ذينفع
items.sql:
SELECT ID
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Replacement_Code"
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'

variables.var_sql: SELECT CONCAT(USR_FIRSTNAME,' ',USR_LASTNAME) FROM USERS WHERE USR_UID = '@=USER_LOGGED'
